SELECT COUNT(EMPLYR_ID) as cnt FROM COMTN_EMPLYR_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_ORGNZT_INFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND IFNULL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND IFNULL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y-%m-%d') AS "toDay" , A.SCHDUL_ID AS "schdulId" , A.SCHDUL_NM AS "schdulNm" , A.OTHBC_SCOPE AS "othbcScope" FROM COMTN_SCHDUL_INFO A WHERE (a.OTHBC_SCOPE = 'G' OR (a.OTHBC_SCOPE = 'C' AND a.TRGET_ID = #{trgetId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) OR (a.OTHBC_SCOPE = 'P' AND (A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) ) AND ( ( SUBSTR(A.SCHDUL_BGNDE,1,8) > DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') AND SUBSTR(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE,1,8) <= DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') ) ) ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT A.SCHDUL_ID AS "schdulId" , A.SCHDUL_SE AS "schdulSe" , A.OTHBC_SCOPE AS "othbcScope" , A.SCHDUL_BGNDE AS "schdulBgnde" , A.SCHDUL_ENDDE AS "schdulEndde" , A.SCHDUL_NM AS "schdulNm" , A.SCHDUL_IPCR_CODE AS "schdulIpcrCode" , A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID AS "schdulChargerId" , (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMVN_USER_MASTER WHERE USER_ID = A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID ) AS "schdulChargerName" , A.REPTIT_SE_CODE AS "reptitSeCode" FROM COMTN_SCHDUL_INFO A WHERE (A.OTHBC_SCOPE = 'G' OR (A.OTHBC_SCOPE = 'C' AND A.TRGET_ID = #{trgetId}) OR (A.OTHBC_SCOPE = 'P' AND (A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID = #{userId} OR A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = #{userId})) )
AND (#{searchMonth} BETWEEN SUBSTR(A.SCHDUL_BGNDE, 1, 6) AND SUBSTR(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, 1, 6) )
AND ( ( SUBSTR(A.SCHDUL_BGNDE,1,8) > #{searchBgnde} AND SUBSTR(A.SCHDUL_BGNDE,1,8) <= #{searchEndde}) OR ( SUBSTR(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE,1,8) > #{searchBgnde} AND SUBSTR(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE,1,8) <= #{searchEndde}) )
AND (#{searchDay} BETWEEN SUBSTR(A.SCHDUL_BGNDE, 1, 8) AND SUBSTR(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, 1, 8) )
AND A.SCHDUL_SE = #{searchSchdulSe}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTN_SCHDUL_INFO A WHERE 1=1
AND A.SCHDUL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')

SELECT A.SCHDUL_ID , A.SCHDUL_SE , A.OTHBC_SCOPE , A.SCHDUL_BGNDE , A.SCHDUL_ENDDE , A.SCHDUL_NM , A.SCHDUL_CN , A.SCHDUL_PLACE , A.SCHDUL_IPCR_CODE , A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMVN_USER_MASTER WHERE USER_ID = A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID) AS "schdulChargerName" , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.REPTIT_SE_CODE , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS "lastUpdusrPnttm" , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTN_SCHDUL_INFO A WHERE SCHDUL_ID = #{schdulId}
